questions.question: how are you

questions.question: What is your restaurant
questions.answer: Our resturant is the Thammanna resort . It is located in Wijayakupotha Chilaw. It has many types of food and drinks. Tasting them will give you a taste experience like never before. Also, this restaurant can be reserved for the parties you want.

questions.question: what are the menu
questions.answer: We have lot of foods, It has type of Beverage, Milkshakes,soups, different type foods Teas and coffees.
